reviewText:
I would not want a copy of this video, even if I were featured in the racing on this video. Even if the quality of the images were better, the events captured will bore you to tears. This disk is endless video clips of average street cars drag racing on a puplic street. There are no exceptional vehicles or races and no action. My 80 year old mother would not find riding in one of those cars exciting.

What a ripoff!!!!!!!!
